<h2><a id="user-content-wrangle" class="anchor" href="#wrangle" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Wrangle</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-e">knitr</span><span class="pl-k">::</span>include_graphics(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>http://r4ds.had.co.nz/diagrams/data-science-wrangle.png<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)</pre></div>

<blockquote>
<p>"(...) The fact that data science exists as a field is a colossal failure of statistics. To me, what I do is what statistics is all about. It is gaining insight from data using modelling and visualization. Data munging and manipulation is hard and statistics has just said that’s not our domain."</p>

<p>Hadley Wickham</p>
</blockquote>

<ul>
<li>Tarefa dolorosa e demorada</li>
<li>Essencial em qualquer análise de dados</li>
<li>Partimos de uma base "crua" e a transforma até obter uma base de dados analítica. </li>
</ul>

<h2><a id="user-content-tidy-data" class="anchor" href="#tidy-data" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Tidy data</h2>

<ol>
<li>Cada linha da base representa uma observação.</li>
<li>Cada coluna da base representa uma variável.</li>
<li><del>Cada tabela considera informações de uma unidade amostral.</del></li>
</ol>

<h2><a id="user-content-pipe-" class="anchor" href="#pipe-" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Pipe <code>%&gt;%</code></h2>

<p>As duas linhas abaixo são equivalentes:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>f(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>, <span class="pl-smi">y</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">x</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% f(<span class="pl-smi">y</span>)</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>install.packages(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>magrittr<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)</pre></div>

<ul>
<li>calcular raiz quadrada da soma dos valores de 1 a 4.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>library(<span class="pl-smi">magrittr</span>)

<span class="pl-smi">x</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> c(<span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">2</span>, <span class="pl-c1">3</span>, <span class="pl-c1">4</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">x</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% <span class="pl-smi">sum</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% <span class="pl-smi">sqrt</span></pre></div>

<p>Escrever esse cálculo na forma usual ficaria da seguinte forma:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>sqrt(sum(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>))</pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-receita-de-bolo" class="anchor" href="#receita-de-bolo" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Receita de bolo</h2>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>esfrie(asse(coloque(bata(acrescente(recipiente(rep(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>farinha<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-c1">2</span>), <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>água<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>fermento<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>leite<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>óleo<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>farinha<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-smi">at</span>é <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>macio<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), <span class="pl-smi">dura</span>çã<span class="pl-v">o</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>3min<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), <span class="pl-v">lugar</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>forma<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">tipo</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>grande<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">untada</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>), <span class="pl-smi">dura</span>çã<span class="pl-v">o</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>50min<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>), <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>geladeira<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>20min<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
</pre></div>

<p>Tente entender o que é preciso fazer. Depois de desistir, veja como fica escrevendo com o operador <code>%&gt;%</code>:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>recipiente(rep(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>farinha<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-c1">2</span>), <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>água<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>fermento<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>leite<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>óleo<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>%
  acrescente(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>farinha<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-smi">at</span>é <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>macio<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>%
  bata(<span class="pl-smi">dura</span>ç<span class="pl-v">o</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>3min<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>%
  coloque(<span class="pl-v">lugar</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>forma<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">tipo</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>grande<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">untada</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>%
  asse(<span class="pl-smi">dura</span>çã<span class="pl-v">o</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>50min<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>%
  esfrie(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>geladeira<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>20min<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
</pre></div>

<p>Agora o código realmente parece uma receita de bolo.</p>

<p>Para mais informações sobre o <code>pipe</code> e exemplos de utilização, visite a página <a href="http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/magrittr/vignettes/magrittr.html">Ceci n'est pas un pipe</a>.</p>

<h2><a id="user-content-pacotes-dplyr-e-tidyr" class="anchor" href="#pacotes-dplyr-e-tidyr" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Pacotes <code>dplyr</code> e <code>tidyr</code></h2>

<h3><a id="user-content-trabalhando-com-tibbles" class="anchor" href="#trabalhando-com-tibbles" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Trabalhando com <code>tibble</code>s</h3>

<p>Uma <code>tibble</code> nada mais é do que um <code>data.frame</code>, mas com um método de impressão mais adequado. Outras diferenças podem ser estudadas <a href="http://r4ds.had.co.nz/tibbles.html">neste link</a>.</p>

<p>Considere a seguinte base de dados.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>library(<span class="pl-smi">dplyr</span>)
library(<span class="pl-smi">tidyr</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> readRDS(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>inputs/pnud_min.rds<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span></pre></div>

<h2><a id="user-content-base-idh-municipal---pnud" class="anchor" href="#base-idh-municipal---pnud" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Base IDH-Municipal - PNUD</h2>

<ul>
<li><code>ano</code> ano do Censo.</li>
<li><code>muni</code> nome do município. Cada município aparece três vezes, um para cada ano.</li>
<li><code>uf</code> Unidade Federativa.</li>
<li><code>regiao</code> região brasileira.</li>
<li><code>idhm</code> IDH municipal, dividido em

<ul>
<li><code>idhm_e</code> IDH municipal - educação.</li>
<li><code>idhm_l</code> IDH municipal - longevidade.</li>
<li><code>idhm_r</code> IDH municipal - renda.</li>
</ul></li>
<li><code>espvida</code> expectativa de vida.</li>
<li><code>rdpc</code> renda <em>per capita</em>.</li>
<li><code>gini</code> coeficiente de gini municipal (mede desigualdade social).</li>
<li><code>pop</code> população residente do município.</li>
<li><code>lat</code>, <code>lon</code> latitude e longitude do município (ponto médio).</li>
</ul>

<h2><a id="user-content-os-cinco-verbos-do-dplyr" class="anchor" href="#os-cinco-verbos-do-dplyr" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Os cinco verbos do <code>dplyr</code></h2>

<ul>
<li><code>filter</code>: filtrar linhas.</li>
<li><code>select</code>: selecionar colunas.</li>
<li><code>mutate</code>: criar/modificar colunas.</li>
<li><code>arrange</code>: ordenar a base.</li>
<li><code>summarise</code>: sumarizar a base em uma linha.</li>
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-características" class="anchor" href="#características" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Características</h3>

<ul>
<li>O <em>input</em>  é sempre uma <code>tibble</code>, e o <em>output</em>  é sempre um <code>tibble</code>.</li>
<li>No primeiro argumento colocamos o <code>tibble</code>, e nos outros argumentos colocamos o que queremos fazer.</li>
<li>A utilização é facilitada com o emprego do operador <code>%&gt;%</code>.</li>
<li>O pacote faz uso de NSE (<em>non standard evaluation</em>).</li>
</ul>

<h3><a id="user-content-vantagens" class="anchor" href="#vantagens" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Vantagens</h3>

<ul>
<li>Utiliza <code>C</code> e <code>C++</code> por trás da maioria das funções, o que geralmente torna o código mais eficiente.</li>
<li>Pode trabalhar com diferentes fontes de dados, como bases relacionais (SQL) e <code>data.table</code>.</li>
</ul>

<h2><a id="user-content-select" class="anchor" href="#select" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>select</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>Utilizar <code>starts_with(x)</code>, <code>contains(x)</code>, <code>matches(x)</code>, <code>one_of(x)</code>, etc.</li>
<li>Possível colocar nomes, índices, e intervalos de variáveis com <code>:</code>.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, <span class="pl-smi">regiao</span>, <span class="pl-smi">muni</span>)</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span><span class="pl-k">:</span><span class="pl-smi">regiao</span>, <span class="pl-smi">rdpc</span>)</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>))</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-filter" class="anchor" href="#filter" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>filter</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>Parecido com <code>subset</code>.</li>
<li>Condições separadas por vírgulas é o mesmo que separar por <code>&amp;</code>.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, <span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-smi">uf</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  filter(<span class="pl-smi">uf</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>AC<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)</pre></div>

<p>Para fazer várias condições, use os operadores lógicos (<code>&amp;</code> e <code>|</code>) ou separando filtros entre vírgulas.</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, <span class="pl-smi">regiao</span>, <span class="pl-smi">uf</span>, <span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  filter(<span class="pl-smi">uf</span> <span class="pl-k">%in%</span> c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>SP<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>MG<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>) <span class="pl-k">|</span> <span class="pl-smi">idhm</span> <span class="pl-k">&gt;</span> .<span class="pl-c1">5</span>, <span class="pl-smi">ano</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-c1">2010</span>)
  <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> é igual a</span>
  <span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> filter(uf %in% c('SP', 'MG') | idhm &gt; .5 &amp; ano == 2010)</span></pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>library(<span class="pl-smi">stringr</span>)
<span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, <span class="pl-smi">uf</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  filter(str_detect(<span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>^[HG]|S$<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>), 
         <span class="pl-smi">ano</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-c1">1991</span>)</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-mutate" class="anchor" href="#mutate" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>mutate</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>Parecido com <code>transform</code>, mas aceita várias novas colunas iterativamente.</li>
<li>Novas variáveis devem ter o mesmo <code>length</code> que o <code>nrow</code> do bd oridinal ou <code>1</code>.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-smi">rdpc</span>, <span class="pl-smi">pop</span>, <span class="pl-smi">idhm_l</span>, <span class="pl-smi">espvida</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  mutate(<span class="pl-v">renda</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">rdpc</span> <span class="pl-k">*</span> <span class="pl-smi">pop</span>, 
         <span class="pl-v">razao</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">idhm_l</span> <span class="pl-k">/</span> <span class="pl-smi">espvida</span>)
</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-arrange" class="anchor" href="#arrange" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>arrange</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>Simplesmente ordena de acordo com as opções.</li>
<li>Utilizar <code>desc</code> para ordem decrescente.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  filter(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-c1">2010</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  arrange(desc(<span class="pl-smi">espvida</span>))</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-summarise" class="anchor" href="#summarise" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>summarise</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>Retorna um vetor de tamanho <code>1</code> a partir de uma conta com as variáveis.</li>
<li>Geralmente é utilizado em conjunto com <code>group_by</code>.</li>
<li>Algumas funções importantes: <code>n()</code>, <code>n_distinct()</code>.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  group_by(<span class="pl-smi">regiao</span>, <span class="pl-smi">uf</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  summarise(<span class="pl-v">n</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> n(), <span class="pl-v">espvida</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> mean(<span class="pl-smi">espvida</span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  arrange(<span class="pl-smi">regiao</span>, desc(<span class="pl-smi">espvida</span>))</pre></div>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  filter(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-c1">2010</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  count(<span class="pl-smi">regiao</span>, <span class="pl-v">sort</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">TRUE</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  mutate(<span class="pl-v">prop</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">n</span> <span class="pl-k">/</span> sum(<span class="pl-smi">n</span>), <span class="pl-v">prop</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-e">scales</span><span class="pl-k">::</span>percent(<span class="pl-smi">prop</span>))</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-gather" class="anchor" href="#gather" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>gather</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>"Empilha" o banco de dados</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">uf</span>, <span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  gather(<span class="pl-smi">tipo_idhm</span>, <span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  arrange(desc(<span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>))</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-spread" class="anchor" href="#spread" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a><code>spread</code></h2>

<ul>
<li>"Joga" uma variável nas colunas</li>
<li>É essencialmente a função inversa de <code>gather</code></li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-smi">uf</span>, <span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  gather(<span class="pl-smi">tipo_idhm</span>, <span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  spread(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, <span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>)</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-funções-auxiliares" class="anchor" href="#funções-auxiliares" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Funções auxiliares</h2>

<ul>
<li><code>unite</code> junta duas ou mais colunas usando algum separador (<code>_</code>, por exemplo).</li>
<li><code>separate</code> faz o inverso de <code>unite</code>, e uma coluna em várias usando um separador.</li>
</ul>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">pnud_min</span> %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-smi">muni</span>, <span class="pl-smi">uf</span>, <span class="pl-smi">ano</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  gather(<span class="pl-smi">tipo_idhm</span>, <span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>, starts_with(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  separate(<span class="pl-smi">tipo_idhm</span>, c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>idhm_nm<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>tipo<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>), <span class="pl-v">sep</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>_<span class="pl-pds">'</span></span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  select(<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-smi">idhm_nm</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  filter(<span class="pl-smi">ano</span> <span class="pl-k">==</span> <span class="pl-c1">2010</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  group_by(<span class="pl-smi">tipo</span>) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  summarise(<span class="pl-v">maior</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">muni</span>[which.max(<span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>)], <span class="pl-v">idhm</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> max(<span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>)) %<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span>% 
  arrange(<span class="pl-smi">tipo</span>, desc(<span class="pl-smi">idhm</span>))</pre></div>

<hr>

<h2><a id="user-content-um-pouco-mais-de-transformação-de-dados" class="anchor" href="#um-pouco-mais-de-transformação-de-dados" aria-hidden="true"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 9h1v1H4c-1.5 0-3-1.69-3-3.5S2.55 3 4 3h4c1.45 0 3 1.69 3 3.5 0 1.41-.91 2.72-2 3.25V8.59c.58-.45 1-1.27 1-2.09C10 5.22 8.98 4 8 4H4c-.98 0-2 1.22-2 2.5S3 9 4 9zm9-3h-1v1h1c1 0 2 1.22 2 2.5S13.98 12 13 12H9c-.98 0-2-1.22-2-2.5 0-.83.42-1.64 1-2.09V6.25c-1.09.53-2 1.84-2 3.25C6 11.31 7.55 13 9 13h4c1.45 0 3-1.69 3-3.5S14.5 6 13 6z"></path></svg></a>Um pouco mais de transformação de dados</h2>

<ul>
<li>Para juntar tabelas, usar <code>inner_join</code>, <code>left_join</code>, <code>anti_join</code>, etc.</li>
<li>Para realizar operações mais gerais, usar <code>do</code>.</li>
<li>Para retirar duplicatas, utilizar <code>distinct</code>.</li>
</ul>
